DataSource.query:
select
distinct *
from
(SELECT
distinct
'A_ZU_KLAEREN',
'A_'||nvl(VVS,'NA')
FROM
dtl_vr_auszahlungen
WHERE
stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)

union all

select distinct
'A_ZU_KLAEREN',
'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA')
from 
dtl_vr_neue_vertraege
where stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)

union all

select distinct
'A_ZU_KLAEREN',
'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA')
from 
dtl_vr_bestandszusagen
where stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)

union all

select distinct
'A_ZU_KLAEREN',
'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA')
from 
dtl_vr_revo_auszahlungen
where stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)

union all

select distinct
'A_ZU_KLAEREN',
'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA')
from 
dtl_vr_entscheidungsvorlagen
where stichtag=(select stichtag from vr_parameter)
and bearb_dat >= to_date('01.04.2011','DD.MM.YYYY')
)
order by 1,2
